arts.ttl: Sunderland will be without four players for Leeds United clash after double injury blow
arts.sum: “After the international break (with Connolly) is still the plan, I think,” said Le Bris. By joining the Leeds United community on WhatsApp, you'll see the biggest and best stories as soon as they happen.

arts.ttl: Johannes Hoff Thorup shares biggest Norwich City frustration as Ramazani makes Leeds United point
arts.sum: Norwich City chief Johannes Hoff Thorup has given his thoughts on their home draw with Leeds United. We took our chances, knowing there was moments in the game we had to defend, we were in our low block for maybe too long but that's how it is against a strong team like Leeds.

arts.ttl: Daniel Farke hails Leeds United's character after spirited Norwich City draw
arts.sum: Daniel Farke said Leeds United's 1-1 draw at his former club Norwich City was a "good advert for the Championship". Whites manager Farke said it was a "good point" on the road, praising the character and spirit his players showed to the midfield reshuffle and going behind.

arts.ttl: Paddy's Pointers: Four observations after Norwich's point against Leeds
arts.sum: Paddy Davitt delivers his Leeds verdict after the Canaries 1-1 Championship draw against Daniel Farke's club

arts.ttl: Leeds hit back to hold Norwich
arts.sum: Norwich and Leeds battled it out for a hard-fought point as an entertaining Championship clash ended in a 1-1 draw.
Highlights from the Sky Bet Championship game between Norwich City and Leeds United.

arts.ttl: Honours even as Norwich and Leeds settle for draw
arts.sum: Largie Ramazani cancelled out Josh Sargent’s opener for City.

arts.ttl: Leeds United player ratings with Gnonto in a class of his own in Norwich draw
arts.sum: Josh Sargent opened the scoring with a spot-kick after he was felled by Joe Rodon before Largie Ramazani equalised after the break. The first half was also marred by an injury to Ilia Gruev, just three days after Ethan Ampadu saw his season written off for the next 10 weeks.

arts.ttl: Leeds injuries: Ilia Gruev limps off with knee issue
arts.sum: Leeds United went into half-time against Norwich City 1-0 down as Joe Rodon’s slide was penalised with a penalty, converted by Josh Sargent, but Ilia Gruev’s issue in the wake of the decision might make matters worse. Ilia Gruev limps off with suspected knee injury in Norwich v Leeds

arts.ttl: Leeds United's injury nightmare continues as key man is forced off against Norwich City
arts.sum: Gruev's injury setback comes four days after club captain Ethan Ampadu suffered a serious knee ligament damage in United's home win over Coventry City. "It's a serious knee injury, he has damaged his lateral ligament - the doctors have recommended a conservative treatment so he doesn't need surgery," United boss Daniel Farke said.
